title: Keyboard shortcuts
content: Is there a shortcut key to move a tab to a new window?
creator: 4bs_now

title: Specific website being bugged only for me
content: So, i have a site i usually visit a lot but since it's last change in firefox is not being displayed correctly, tried resetting the cookies and cache, resetting zoom and nothing, what can i do?
creator: ferran.epifanio.cervera

title: Firefox Default Search Option is Limited
content:
Hello,

Is there any way I can opt out of the big 5 or 6, regarding "default" search engines? Do I need an add on for that? Or is there a way I can have the freedom to choose how to look for info?

I am trying to default my Search Home page, or engine, or whatever to Yandex.com. The add-on Yandex offers does not work, nor have been updated for years.

Am I locked by what ever Firefox offers, from the usual search engines?

I am at an edge to forsake Firefox, after 20 years of having it as my default browser, because how cirppling and controlling regarding search engines.

Thanx
creator: aritus7

title: Firefox and Ally Bank web site
content: Experiencing weird behavior on Ally Bank's site, just recently. Some pages only partially load; some will more fully load on a reload command, but still not all options appear. Example: On the Transfer page, I can enter the source account for the transfer, but the target account and other info either doesn't appear at all, or is inoperable (dropdown box is dead.) Works fine in Chrome, which is where Ally support directed me.
creator: joedid
